Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Finance

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend Sections 458 and 458-a of the New York Real Property Tax Law, in relation to extending partial property tax exemption provisions of such sections to the school tax portion of New York State property taxes for qualified veterans.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending partial property tax exemption provisions of such sections to the school tax portion of NYS property taxes for qualified veterans.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and adopt, and the Governor to sign, legislation which would amend the New York State Real Property Tax Law (RPTL) to expand the veterans’ property tax exemption to include an exemption on the school portion of the tax for veterans with incomes below $47,500 and to increase the maximum income eligibility thresholds of the Senior Citizen Homeowners Exemption (SCHE) program and the Disabled Homeowners Exemption (DHE) program to the same level.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Amend the NYS Real Property Tax Law (RPTL) to expand the veterans’ property tax exemption to include an exemption on the school portion of the tax for veterans with incomes below $47,500.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to amend Sections 458 and 458-a of the New York Real Property Tax Law, in relation to extending partial property tax exemption provisions of such sections to the school tax portion of New York State property taxes for qualified veterans.
Items.MinutesNote: Voted to be Filed by the Committee on Finance
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Filed by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending partial property tax exemption provisions of such sections to the school tax portion of NYS property taxes for qualified veterans.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to introduce and adopt, and the Governor to sign, legislation which would amend the New York State Real Property Tax Law (RPTL) to expand the veterans’ property tax exemption to include an exemption on the school portion of the tax for veterans with incomes below $47,500 and to increase the maximum income eligibility thresholds of the Senior Citizen Homeowners Exemption (SCHE) program and the Disabled Homeowners Exemption (DHE) program to the same level.
Items.MinutesNote: Voted on by the Committee on Finance
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was P-C Item Approved by Comm
Items.MatterName: Amend the NYS Real Property Tax Law (RPTL) to expand the veterans’ property tax exemption to include an exemption on the school portion of the tax for veterans with incomes below $47,500.
